thread.title: Gamer outrage leads Deus Ex to cancel augmented pre-orders

title: Gamer outrage leads Deus Ex to cancel augmented pre-orders
text:
Gamer outrage leads Deus Ex to cancel augmented pre-orders 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Pre-orders bonuses are evil, but tiered bonuses are a special kind of awful. Deus Ex had both, but after everyone revolted against it, Squar...
